overview: Cadinot is releasing his classic short films from the early 1980s in value compilation form. Seeing as how each of these short film have for years been only available as single VHS videos at premium prices, this is to be welcomed. Cadinot Classics 1 contains four complete Cadinot films: Escalier de Service (1987), Le Chantier (1980), Stop (1980), Garcons de Reves (1981)
title: Cadinot Classics 1
